nosotros.title: About us
nosotros.p1: We are a law firm specialized in business law, focused on the innovation and consolidation of companies. We provide legal services to boost and strengthen our clients’ ideas, aligned with their business model.
nosotros.p2: We offer comprehensive legal counsel with a 360° approach, based on legal instrumentation, structuring, and legal engineering. With over 11 years of experience, we have advised and consolidated companies across sectors such as finance, food industry, real estate, construction, hospitality, hydrocarbons, agriculture, and mining. Our corporate legal services include civil, commercial, corporate, contractual, labor, financial, industrial and intellectual property law, estate planning, and AML compliance.

mission.title: Mission
mission.text: We provide specialized corporate legal services to consolidate companies across different sectors with efficiency and professionalism. We apply legal engineering to address specific needs with strategic solutions.

vision.title: Vision
vision.text: To be a benchmark in corporate legal services, recognized for our ability to consolidate and strengthen companies. Through research, innovation, problem-solving, and adaptability to the business environment, we aim to contribute to our country’s economic and social development.

valores.title: OUR VALUES
valores.general: We highlight our commitment to integrity, professionalism, responsibility, and ethics in every legal service we provide.

confianza.title: TRUST
confianza.desc: We build legal certainty in every interaction, communicating clearly and delivering on our promises.

lealtad.title: LOYALTY
lealtad.desc: We act with genuine commitment to our clients and their goals, always protecting their interests.

honestidad.title: HONESTY
honestidad.desc: We are transparent and straightforward. We state what is viable and what is not, with sound reasoning and professional ethics.

responsabilidad.title: RESPONSIBILITY
responsabilidad.desc: We handle each matter with discipline, timely follow-up, and accountability at all times.

experiencia: General Director of RCCO Abogados, he holds a Law degree from the Instituto Tecnológico Superior de Sinaloa and a postgraduate degree in Law of Obligations and Contracts from Universidad Panamericana, Guadalajara Campus. His experience spans various areas such as commercial, corporate, civil, labor, and corporate law. His leadership within the firm enables him to provide comprehensive solutions to clients across diverse business sectors.

Law graduate from the Universidad Autónoma de Sinaloa, with more than 10 years of experience in industrial and intellectual property. He has collaborated across various sectors such as real estate, construction, hospitality, and services. In addition to being a partner at the firm, he currently serves as Chairman of the Board of Directors, a role that allows him to apply his strategic vision in both the legal and business spheres.

Law graduate from the Universidad Autónoma de Sinaloa, with more than 12 years of experience in the corporate field. He specializes in drafting and reviewing commercial company contracts, as well as advising on legal strategies. He is currently a Partner Attorney at the firm, where he contributes his extensive experience to high-impact legal decision-making for corporate clients.

Law graduate from the Universidad Autónoma de Sinaloa, with a postgraduate degree in Law of Obligations and Contracts from Universidad Panamericana. He has 10 years of experience advising companies, primarily in the communications, services, hospitality, construction, and finance sectors. In his role as Senior Attorney, he specializes in corporate and contract law, as well as compliance with anti-money laundering regulations.

Law graduate from the Universidad Autónoma de Sinaloa, currently pursuing a Master’s degree in Business Law at Universidad Anáhuac. As a Junior Attorney, she has worked in various areas of law, including civil, commercial, corporate, anti-money laundering compliance, and industrial property. Her multidisciplinary approach allows her to adapt to the legal needs of diverse sectors.

Law graduate from the Universidad Autónoma de Sinaloa, with a postgraduate degree in Mediation and Alternative Dispute Resolution from UNAM. She has over 10 years of experience, particularly in matters related to gender-based violence, health law, environmental law, and conciliation procedures. As an Attorney at the firm, she specializes in corporate, labor, and civil law, providing support to clients in complex situations.

entretenimiento.title: Entertainment Industry
entretenimiento.desc: Talent, production, distribution, and sponsorship agreements. Licensing and protection of copyrights/trademarks (INDAUTOR/IMPI). Negotiations with platforms and advertising compliance for events and content.
bullets: Negotiations with platforms and advertising compliance

agricola.title: Agricultural Sector
agricola.desc: Regularization of land (private/ejido), water, and land use. Supply and export contracts with phytosanitary verification. Seasonal labor compliance and certifications.

construccion.title: Construction Sector
construccion.desc: Construction contracts (EPC, unit prices), subcontracts, and bonds. Permits, licenses, and public/private bids. Prevention and management of claims and occupational risks.
bullets: Prevention of claims and occupational risks

inmobiliario.title: Real Estate Sector
inmobiliario.desc: Real estate and development due diligence; purchase-sale and leasing. Trusts, condominium regime, and pre-sale (PROFECO). Urban permits and project tax structuring.

financiero.title: Financial Sector
financiero.desc: Incorporation and regulation of SOFOM, SOFIPO, and fintech; relations with CNBV/Banxico. Credit contracts, guarantees, and debt structuring. AML/CFT, corporate governance, and data protection.
bullets: Incorporation and regulation of financial entities
AML/CFT, corporate governance, and data protection

alimentario.title: Food Industry
alimentario.desc: Registrations, filings, and compliance with COFEPRIS; NOM-051 labeling. Contracts with suppliers, maquila, distribution, and retail. Sanitary management, traceability, and recall plans.

minero.title: Mining Industry
minero.desc: Concessions, transfers, and easements; agreements with communities. Environmental permits (SEMARNAT), impact, and industrial safety. Exploration, offtake, and financing contracts.

turismo.title: Hospitality and Tourism
turismo.desc: Hotel operation, franchise, and management contracts. Licenses (alcohol, federal maritime land zone), timeshares, and PROFECO compliance. OTA contracts, consumer protection, and 24/7 labor compliance.
